meanings.definition: relating to or involving the formation of red blood cells
meanings.sent1: The erythroblastic process is crucial for creating red blood cells.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the erythroblastic stage to understand red blood cell development.
meanings.sent3: The erythroblastic journey of red blood cells is like a colorful adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was as erythroblastic as the creation of red blood cells.
meanings.sent5: The classroom demonstration made the erythroblastic concept clear and fascinating.

meanings.sent1: The erythroblastic appearance of the cells indicated their stage of development.
meanings.sent2: The erythroblastic features of the tissue sample were analyzed under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The erythroblastic patterns on the fabric looked like tiny blood cells.
meanings.sent4: His artwork was erythroblastic, capturing the essence of erythroblasts in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The erythroblastic design on the cover caught the eye of every reader.
